summary: A comprehensive suite of unit tests that validate the behavior of the mocked AWS CloudWatch Logs service using Moto. The tests cover creation, deletion, and description of log groups, log streams, metric filters, resource policies, retention settings, and tags, as well as handling of pagination, input validation, and error scenarios.
business_intent: To ensure that the simulated CloudWatch Logs implementation correctly mimics the real AWS service, providing reliable testing for applications that interact with log management features.
